dk.pervasive.jcaf.impl
Class ContextServiceImpl

java.lang.Object
  java.rmi.server.RemoteObject
      java.rmi.server.RemoteServer
          java.rmi.server.UnicastRemoteObject
              dk.pervasive.jcaf.impl.ContextServiceImpl
All Implemented Interfaces:
ContextClientHandler, ContextService, EntityListenerHandler, PeerHandler, TransformerRepository, java.io.Serializable, java.rmi.Remote
public class ContextServiceImpl
extends java.rmi.server.UnicastRemoteObject
implements ContextService

This is the RMI implementation class of the ContexService interface.

Author:
Jakob Bardram

Method Detail

restart

public void restart()
This method restarts the Context Service which includes making a new registration in the RMI Registry. Data is preserved.

lookupEntity

public void lookupEntity(java.lang.String id,
                         int hops,
                         RemoteDiscoveryListener dl)
                  throws java.rmi.RemoteException
Description copied from interface: PeerHandler
Looks up an Entity object in several context services. If the Entity is not found in this service, then the request is dispatched to services that this service knows of in a peer-to-peer fashion. The call is non-blocking. Hence a callback object must be specified as a RemoteDiscoveryListener.

Specified by:
lookupEntity in interface PeerHandler
Parameters:
id - a String value
hops - a int value specifying how many hops in the peer-to-peer setting to look for the entity.
Throws:
java.rmi.RemoteException

addContextItem

public void addContextItem(java.lang.String entity_id,
                           Relationship relation,
                           ContextItem item)
                    throws java.rmi.RemoteException
Description copied from interface: ContextService
Adds a ContextItem object with the specified Relationship to the entity's context. The relationship is the key to the context item. If this relationship already exists it is replaced.

Specified by:
addContextItem in interface ContextService
Parameters:
entity_id - the id of the entity.
relation - the relationship between the context item and the context
item - the ContextItem to add

java.rmi.RemoteException

addContextClient

public void addContextClient(int type,
                             java.lang.Class item_type,
                             RemoteContextClient client)
                      throws java.rmi.RemoteException
Description copied from interface: ContextClientHandler
Adds a RemoteContextClient to this handler. The type of this client can be either of type TYPE_ACTUATOR or TYPE_MONITOR. A client added to a handler will be notified when context information needs to be refreshed. For example, a WLAN Monitor able to report on location based on WLAN triangualtion may register at a handler and be called when fresh location information is needed.

Specified by:
addContextClient in interface ContextClientHandler
Parameters:
type - - the type of the remote ContextClient (monitor or actuator)
item_type - - the type of the RelationShip
client - - the remote ContextClient
Throws:
java.rmi.RemoteException
See Also:
RemoteContextClient, ContextService

authenticate

public SecureContextService authenticate(java.lang.String client_id,
                                         byte[] data,
                                         byte[] signature)
                                  throws java.rmi.RemoteException
Description copied from interface: ContextClientHandler
This method is used to authenticate Secure Context Clients to this handler.

Specified by:
authenticate in interface ContextClientHandler
Parameters:
client_id - - the id of the client.
data - - som random generated data.
signature - - a valid signature on the above data using PKI.
Returns:
a secure context service that can be used for adding secure context items.
Throws:
java.rmi.RemoteException

addPublicKey

public void addPublicKey(java.lang.String client,
                         java.security.PublicKey public_key)
                  throws java.rmi.RemoteException
Description copied from interface: ContextClientHandler
This method is used to remotely add a secure context monitor's public key to this Context Monitor Handler. This method is rather a hack , because we do not necessarily trust the clients using this method, and we can hence have insecure clients adding themselves as secure using this interface. BUT - it is used for testing!

Specified by:
addPublicKey in interface ContextClientHandler
Parameters:
client - - the id of the RemoteContextClient
public_key - - the public key in an PKI setup
Throws:
java.rmi.RemoteException

Description copied from interface: TransformerRepository
This method return a Context Transfomer that can translate from one or more ContextItem types to another.

Specified by:
getContextTransformer in interface TransformerRepository
Parameters:
in - - an array of the types of ContextItems to transform from
out - - the type of ContextItem to transform to
Returns:
a ContextTranslator, which can transform from 'in' to 'out', or null if no match was found.
